macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Wall Street Joins Global Markets in Upbeat Start to 2026
items.summary: The S&P 500 rose 0.7%, following a gain of more than 16% in 2025. The Dow Jones Industrial Average increased 42 points, or 0.1%.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Hits Record Levels Amid Surging Institutional Demand
items.summary: Bitcoin reached record highs in the first week of January 2026, driven by increased institutional interest, ETF accumulations, and Ethereum's transition to Proof-of-Stake enhancing its dominance in DeFi and NFTs.

items.title: Global Crypto Market Cap Reaches $3.02T, Up 1.97% in 24 Hours
items.summary: The cryptocurrency market capitalization stands at $3.02 trillion, with a 1.97% increase over the past day; Bitcoin trades at $89,168 (up 1.52%), while outperformers include HOLO (+33%), PEPE (+23%), and DOGE (+6.57%).

items.title: Grayscale Submits Registration for Potential Bittensor ETF
items.summary: Grayscale Investments has filed for a potential Bittensor ETF, signaling growing institutional interest in AI-focused blockchain projects amid mixed market trends.

items.title: Solana Leads Blockchain Fee Revenue in 2025, Surpassing Ethereum
items.summary: Solana topped blockchain fee revenue for 2025, outpacing Ethereum and TRON, thanks to high transaction speeds and low fees attracting projects and developers.

items.title: Federal Reserve Expected to Cut Interest Rates Four Times in 2026
items.summary: Anticipated Fed rate cuts four times in 2026 could boost crypto markets, contrasting with record outflows from U.S. Bitcoin ETFs in late 2025.

items.title: Regulatory Advances: US CLARITY Act, EU MiCA Implementation
items.summary: The US advances the CLARITY Act and spot ETFs for Bitcoin/Ethereum; EU implements MiCA for unified crypto regulation, while Asia fosters favorable environments.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Gecko Robotics Deepens AI Integration for Infrastructure Inspection
items.summary: Pittsburgh-based Gecko Robotics has leaned into artificial intelligence to enhance its robotic inspection capabilities for infrastructure, amid a landscape where many companies struggle to see returns from generative AI investments.

items.title: AI Leaders Predict 2026 as Year of Model Races, Agents, and Profitability Pressure
items.summary: Experts forecast continued competition in AI model development, growth in AI agents, and increasing demands for companies to demonstrate real-world financial returns from AI in 2026.

items.title: 2026 Marks Arrival of AI Governance and Regulatory Enforcement
items.summary: Regulatory frameworks for AI accountability, including transparency and risk mitigation, will take effect in 2026, with bodies like the EU AI Office beginning supervision of general-purpose models.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Free Games Lineup for January 2026 Announced
items.summary: A new selection of free-to-play games and giveaways for PC, PS5, and Xbox is available in January 2026, including Epic Games Store titles like Total War: Three Kingdoms and Wildgate claimable until January 8. Steam highlights upcoming F2P releases such as Highguard, The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin, and Arknights: Endfield on January 22.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: TSMC Stock Rises After Nvidia Requests Boost in H200 Chip Production
items.summary: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) shares increased 1.4% following a request from NVIDIA to ramp up production of H200 chips due to strong demand.

items.title: Wedbush Analyst Predicts 20-25% Climb for Tech Stocks in 2026
items.summary: Dan Ives from Wedbush Securities forecasts tech stocks, including Nvidia and Tesla, to rise 20-25% in 2026, calling it a 'prove it year' with focus on autonomous robotics and US tech leadership.

items.title: CES 2026 Gearing Up to Showcase Latest Tech Products Next Week
items.summary: The Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas is preparing to feature the newest products and tech innovations starting next week.
